product_name: Tata Agni Leaf, 500g: Amazon.in: Amazon Pantry

reviews.review_body: This was packed along with detergent soaps without segregating it and also packet was torned and all the tea powder was spreaded in the bag.I want replacement for this package, but it is saying this item is not eligible for replacement.Please give me a call.

reviews.review_title: Good Tea But I Paid Rs10 More Than Mrp!
reviews.review_body: The tea itself is good with nice taste but the only problem i didnt gaved 5 stars was that its mrp is 100 and amazon charged me 110 damn! i thought im getting a deal untill i saw the mrp on the pack. so amazon should do something abt it so that we should not be changed more than the mrp thas it

reviews.review_title: Value For Money with Good Taste!
reviews.review_body: My Favourite Tea. Very less particles of Tea dust.Try it with Tulsi leaves and Ginger.Superb Taste !! Budget Price !!

reviews.review_title: Drink for the caffeine, not the taste.
reviews.review_body: This tea is actually sour and has a very weird smell. I could not drink it. Offered it to my wife's helping hand. She said it is "barely drinkable". But I must admit that it wakes you up like Nescafe. Cheap tea which does the job.
I dont drink tea but I ordered it for my mother who is a chai lover.This tea by TATA is really value for money at a less price range.This time I order 2 packets for next few months.
You need to add too much of the leaves to experience a distinct flavour and get proper colour of the tea. Otherwise it just looks like sweetened pink milk

reviews.review_title: Charging extra 116 for wat on pack it self it is showing 100 including all taxes
reviews.review_body: On packet only they wrot including all taxes 100 then y amazon collecting 116 from me i dont now i didn't see on pacjet before order other wise...
Agni tata tea cost cutting is 109 rupees per piece from my account but I have received 100 rupee per piece. I am lost of 18 rupees total as per cost print in pkg.Please help us on priority.
